APBS utilitiesÂ¶

APBS is distributed with utilities designed to simplify typical tasks associated with electrostatics calculations.

Conversion utilities

  • amber2charmm.sh
  • del2dx
  • dx2mol
  • dx2uhbd
  • qcd2pqr.awk
  • uhbd_asc2bin
  • WHATIF2AMBER.sed

Benchmarking utilities

  • benchmark

Calculation setup and analysis utilities

  • analysis
  • born
  • coulomb
  • dxmath
  • inputgen.py
  • mergedx and mergedx2
  • mgmesh
  • multivalue
  • psize.py
  • similarity
  • smooth
